data.comment: Coritiba kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Fortaleza at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
In the minute 7, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Fortaleza are coming forward and Wellington Paulista gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 9, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Fortaleza.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 14, Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a throw-in for Fortaleza, close to Coritiba's area.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 16, Fortaleza are pushing forward but Osvaldo's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 20, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Coritiba.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
Osvaldo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fortaleza.
In the minute 23, Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Fortaleza.
In the minute 25, Fortaleza's Wellington Paulista fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Throw-in Coritiba.
In the minute 27, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Coritiba's Robson is on target but unsuccessful.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Giovanni Augusto of Coritiba gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Fortaleza.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 32, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Can Fortaleza capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Coritiba's half?
In the minute 39, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Fortaleza's Yuri Cesar gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Fortaleza at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In Curitiba, Wellington Paulista (Fortaleza) misses the target with a header.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Curitiba.
The second-half is underway. Fortaleza with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Jonathan is replacing Natanael for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Throw-in Coritiba.
Free kick Fortaleza.
In the minute 51, Robson for Coritiba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 52, Fortaleza have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Fortaleza close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 56, Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Fortaleza needs to be cautious. Coritiba have an attacking throw-in.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Jorginho (Coritiba) is making a second substitution, with Yan Sasse replacing Ricardo Oliveira.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 59, Nathan Silva (Coritiba) gets booked by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 63, Jackson (Fortaleza) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Coritiba's Yan Sasse breaks free at Estadio Couto Pereira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
In the minute 65, Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 67, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
In the minute 69, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
Fortaleza's Yuri Cesar misses with an attempt on goal.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
In the minute 71, In Curitiba Coritiba attack through Jonathan. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Couto Pereira.
William Matheus is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 73, The away team have replaced Wellington Paulista with Tinga. This is the first substitution made today by Rogerio Ceni.
Rogerio Ceni is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Couto Pereira with Marlon replacing Juninho.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Fortaleza.
In the minute 76, Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Coritiba's Gabriel Santana gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 77, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Coritiba's William Matheus is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 78, Rogerio Ceni is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Couto Pereira with Franco Rodrigo Fragapane replacing Osvaldo.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Coritiba.
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Jorginho (Coritiba) is making a third substitution, with Nathan replacing Gabriel Santana.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Fortaleza.
In the minute 85, Coritiba's Yan Sasse misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 86, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Romarinho (Fortaleza) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Fortaleza.
Fortaleza drive upfield and Tinga gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Coritiba defender.
Throw-in Coritiba.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Curitiba.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Full-time! The final score is 0-0.
The away team have replaced Yuri Cesar with Mariano Vazquez. This is the fourth substitution made today by Rogerio Ceni.
Carlinhos is replacing Ronald for Fortaleza at Estadio Couto Pereira.
